name: socorro-webapp
//browserComment: The 'browser' key indicates to ESBuild that we're client-side and not to install listed packages
This is necessitated by 'metrics-graphics' source code, which is very old and triggers build errors with listed packages.
author: Mozilla

scripts.build: rm -rf static/* && node esbuild && npm run build:collectstatic
scripts.build:collectstatic: TOOL_ENV=True ./manage.py collectstatic --noinput -i crashstats -i api -i documentation -i profile -i signature -i status -i supersearch -i tokens -i topcrashers
